name: context7
title: Context7
description: Up-to-date documentation for any library directly in your prompts
about:
## Context7 MCP

Context7 pulls up-to-date, version-specific documentation and code examples straight from the source â€” and places them directly in your prompt.

### Why Context7?

- **Always Current** - Documentation is fetched in real-time
- **Version Specific** - Get docs for the exact version you're using
- **Code Examples** - Includes working code snippets

### Supported Libraries

Context7 supports thousands of libraries across multiple ecosystems including npm, PyPI, and more.

### Usage

Simply ask about any library and Context7 will fetch the relevant documentation.

tools.name: resolve_library_id
tools.title: Resolve Library
tools.description: Resolves a library name to a Context7-compatible library ID. Always call this first before fetching documentation.

library_name.description: The name of the library to search for (e.g., 'react', 'nextjs', 'postgres')

tools.name: get_library_docs
tools.title: Get Documentation
tools.description: Fetches up-to-date documentation for a library. Use the library ID from resolve_library_id.

topic.description: Optional: Focus the documentation on a specific topic

tokens.description: Maximum number of tokens for the response
